description:
No <abstraction><power production> shall take place unless the number of blades, diameter of the turbine and the maximum revolutions per minute (rpm) of the turbine comply with the parameters stated in the table below unless otherwise approved in writing by the Agency.

Number of blades        Minimum diameter of turbine (m)        Maximum RPM
5        3.0        24
4        2.2        30
3        1.4        32

The turbine shall have not less than 3 and not more than 5 blades.
